hero.title: Committed to Deliver
hero.subtitle: Ensuring clean, safe water supply and efficient sewerage services for Karachi.

projects.title: K-IV Water Supply Project (Phase-I)
projects.summary: Add 260 MGD of water to the Karachi system, including bulk conveyance, pumping stations, and distribution upgrades.

projects.title: Dhabeji Pumping Station Rehabilitation
projects.summary: Rehabilitation and upgrade of pumping machinery at Dhabeji to ensure optimal transmission capacity and reduced downtime.

projects.title: Sewerage System Overhaul (District East)
projects.summary: Replacement of damaged sewage lines and construction of new disposal structures in District East.

projects.title: Water Tanker Service Digitization
projects.summary: Centralized digital system for managing tanker requests, tracking, and billing to improve transparency.

projects.title: Gadani Bulk Water Supply Scheme
projects.summary: Construction of a new bulk water line to connect Gadani to the main KW&SC network.

leadershipInsights.title: Our Vision
leadershipInsights.description: A future where Karachi receives uninterrupted, clean, and safe water through modernized infrastructure and progressive leadership.

leadershipInsights.title: Our Mission
leadershipInsights.description: To provide efficient water supply and sewerage services through sustainable operations, innovative planning, and skilled leadership.

leadershipInsights.title: Core Values
leadershipInsights.description: Transparency, accountability, innovation, and public service form the foundation of KW&SC’s leadership principles.

achievements.title: Hydrant Management Cell
achievements.summary: Established comprehensive hydrant management system to combat illegal water connections.

achievements.title: Global Water Summit 2024
achievements.summary: Represented Pakistan at the prestigious Global Water Summit in London.

achievements.title: Rangers Partnership
achievements.summary: Joined forces with Pakistan Rangers to combat illegal hydrants and water theft.

achievements.title: Fareeda Salam Center
achievements.summary: Established community development center to engage with local communities.

achievements.title: Grievance Redressal
achievements.summary: Introduced comprehensive GRM cell to address customer complaints.

achievements.title: Digital Transformation
achievements.summary: Implemented online billing, mobile apps, and automated systems.

workflow.title: Bulk Water Supply & Treatment
workflow.summary: Managing abstraction of raw water, pumping systems, and treatment operations across Karachi.

workflow.title: Sewerage Infrastructure Management
workflow.summary: Planning, operating, and maintaining the sewerage network, pumping stations, and treatment of wastewater.

workflow.title: Distribution & Network Integrity
workflow.summary: Managing the distribution network, reducing NRW, and minimizing illegal connections through asset rehabilitation.

workflow.title: Revenue, Customer & Governance
workflow.summary: Driving financial sustainability, accurate metering, billing, grievance redressal, and governance.

faqs.question: How can I get a new water connection?
faqs.answer: For residential, commercial, bulk, or industrial connections, submit an application with required documents at the nearest KW&SC office. The process includes site inspection, approval, and installation.

faqs.question: How can I get a duplicate bill?
faqs.answer: Visit web.kwsb.crdc.biz or the nearest KW&SC office with your account number and CNIC to get a duplicate bill.

faqs.question: Where can I complain about sewerage?
faqs.answer: Use complain.kwsc.gos.pk or call (+92) 021 111 597 200 to log sewerage complaints.

faqs.question: How can I order a water tanker?
faqs.answer: Book through campaign.kwsc.gos.pk or by calling our customer service helpline.

faqs.question: How can I report water theft?
faqs.answer: Call (+92) 021 111 597 200 or contact the Hydrant Management Cell to report illegal connections.

waterToday.title: Water Today – Daily Water Supply Status
waterToday.summary: Today’s water distribution across Karachi remains stable, with major pumping stations operating at optimal capacity.
